Ability.Name: Tier 2 Command Boost

Description.OldValue: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 90-189 by 15% for 2 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)

Ability.Description: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 90-179 by 15% for 2 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)

Ability.Name: Tier 3 Command Boost

Description.OldValue: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 190-300 by 15% for 2 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)

Ability.Description: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 180-300 by 15% for 2 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)

Ability.Name: Superior Command Boost
Ability.Description: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 1-179 by 100% for 3 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)

Ability.Name: Superior Command Boost
Ability.Description: Increases command points gained in Command Ranks 1-179 by 100% for 2 hours. Does not affect Command Stash disintegrations. Cannot be combined with any other Command Boost. (Cooldown: 1 hour)
